# ðŸ›  BEM Setup Guide

To use **BEM**, you need **TensorFlow**.  
For convenience, we recommend using **[Google Colab](https://colab.research.google.com/)**.

For details, see [google-research/encyclopedic_vqa](https://github.com/google-research/google-research/tree/master/encyclopedic_vqa).
